description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. In a world that gives you lemons, make lemonade... and SELL IT!  Aided by break-even analysis and weather forecasts, determine the most profitable strategy by deciding stock levels, price, and marketing.  Monitor sales throughout the day and track growth with daily graphs and reports.  Simple to learn but difficult to master, you must compete for top place in the company league table!
